# Base projection  3-model recruitment 1-ECDF setup
# Short-Term Model is ECDF of Recruitment (age-0 M-adjusted to age-1, 000s) 2014-2018
# Medium-Term Model is ECDF of Recruitment (age-0 M-adjusted to age-1, 000s) 1999-2018
# Long-Term Model is Fitted BH Recruitment (age-0 M-adjusted to age-1, 000s) 1977-2020
#
# Model Weights Set by Inverse-Weighting for Predicted Age-1 R in 2020-2021
# Using ECDFs for 2015-2019 and 2000-2019 age-1 adjusted recruitment
# Weight(Short-Term) = 0.12
# Weight (Medium-Term) = 0.84
# Weight (Long-Term) = 0.04
# Input Model Probabilities: 0.12 0.84 0.04
#
# Model Weights Set by Inverse-Weighting With Annual Variance Adjustment for Predicted R in 2020-2021
# Weight(Short-Term) = 0.13
# Weight (Medium-Term) = 0.85
# Weight (Long-Term) = 0.02
# Input Model Probabilities: 0.13 0.85 0.02
